summary: This is an email from August 25, 2008, forwarding a draft letter addressed to individuals named Lefkowitz and Black for review. The email asks the recipient to provide any changes to the attached document.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 25, 2008.
The email forwards a draft letter intended for individuals named Lefkowitz and Black.
The sender requests feedback on any changes to the attached draft letter.
